SEARCH
Package users

Class Teacher

java.lang.Object
users.User
users.Employee
users.Teacher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, CanBeResearcher
public class Teacher extends Employee implements CanBeResearcher, Serializable
The Teacher class represents a user with the role of a teacher in the system. It extends the Employee class and implements the CanBeResearcher interface.
See Also:

      Parameterized constructor for the Teacher class. Initializes the teacher with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the teacher.
      login - The login of the teacher.
      password - The password of the teacher.
      name - The name of the teacher.
      surname - The surname of the teacher.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the teacher.
      email - The email of the teacher.
      salary - The salary of the teacher.
      faculty - The faculty to which the teacher belongs.
      academicDegree - The academic degree of the teacher.
      coursesMap - Map containing courses taught by the teacher and associated students.
